scripts.dev: cross-env TZ=UTC NODE_ENV=development NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=8192 $NODE_OPTIONS" nodemon --config nodemon.json
scripts.lint: yarn run lint:eslint && yarn run lint:feature-config
scripts.rebuild: yarn run clean && yarn run build
scripts.start: cross-env TZ=UTC NODE_ENV=production NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=8192 $NODE_OPTIONS" node -r tsconfig-paths/register -r ts-node/register build/src/main
scripts.start:pgsql: yarn run rebuild && cross-env TZ=UTC NODE_ENV=development ts-node scripts/start-pgsql/run.ts
scripts.typeorm:fake: cross-env TZ=UTC NODE_ENV=development yarn typeorm migration:run -f -d ./src/migration.config.ts
scripts.typeorm:revert: yarn run rebuild && cross-env TZ=UTC NODE_ENV=development yarn typeorm migration:revert -d ./src/migration.config.ts
scripts.typeorm:run: yarn run rebuild && cross-env TZ=UTC NODE_ENV=development yarn typeorm migration:run -d ./src/migration.config.ts
scripts.typeorm:schema: cross-env TZ=UTC NODE_ENV=development yarn typeorm schema:sync -d src/migration.config.ts
scripts.typeorm:show: cross-env TZ=UTC NODE_ENV=development yarn typeorm migration:show -d ./src/migration.config.ts
